albot.grid_based.connect4

Class Connect4Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • albot.AlbotConnection
      • albot.grid_based.GridBasedGame
        • albot.grid_based.connect4.Connect4Game

  • public class Connect4Game
extends GridBasedGame
    A high level Connect4 library which sets up the connection and provides basic logic.

      • playGame

        public void playGame(java.util.function.Function<Connect4Board,java.lang.Integer> decideMove,
                     boolean autoRestart)
        Plays an entire game by making moves returned by the function provided.
        Parameters:
        decideMove - a function which takes the current board as argument and returns a move to play
        autoRestart - whether you want the game to restart automatically after it has finished
